Localization.Name: Origin Jumpworks
Localization.Description: Known primarily for high-end ship manufacturing, but also provides some custom parts for their ships - particularly maneuvering thrusters. Sleek and elegant fusion of art and engineering

English.Name: Origin Jumpworks
English.Description: Known primarily for high-end ship manufacturing, but also provides some custom parts for their ships - particularly maneuvering thrusters. Sleek and elegant fusion of art and engineering

Localization.Name: ST-205 Missile Rack
Localization.Description:
Item Type: Missile Rack
Manufacturer: Behring
Size: 2
Missiles: 8xS2

To further improve the defenses of the Origin 400i, Behring built the SNT-205 "Santoro", which can carry and deploy eight S2 missiles.
